### Installing

Go to your project root.

cd your_project

git clone git://github.com/hackable/coolie.git

cd coolie

chmod +x coolie.sh


### Configuration.

Go to config file in coolie and change options according to your needs.

SSH_USER  - The username  on remote host
SSH_HOST  - The hostname  on remote host 
SSH_KEY   - The IdentityFile on remote host
LOCAL_DIR - The directory of your project on local machine
REMOTE_DIR= The directory of your project on remote machine


### Usage

./coolie.sh --local

This will sync and download remote files to your local host.

./coolie.sh --remote

This will sync and upload local files to your remote host.
tagline: Coolie is deployment tool based on rysnc lets you ship apps to remote machines and vise versa using just one command.
